<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Nethysian Bulwark](/Equipment.aspx?ID=546)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 77</row>

**Price** 8,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This round shield is often fashioned to resemble the religious symbol of its dual-natured namesake. A _Nethysian bulwark_ is a [high-grade cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=311) [shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 10, HP 40, BT 20) that defends the wielder and can explode with retributive force when struck.

<document level="2" id="action-345" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Nethysian Bulwark
